w: and those who lay hold of her
when you already have the means
At the end of your life
if you have struck hands in pledge
and those who seek me early
But he who fails to find me
but the one who is devious
brings a rod to his back
but he who brings it up
you will have to do so again
he who is under the wrath
and may she who gave you birth
with those who convict the guilty
and he will give you rest
and you will bear the guilt
